titleStmt.title: A Free and impartial inquiry into the causes of that very great esteem and honour that the non-conforming preachers are generally in with their followers in a letter to his honoured friend H.M. / by a lover of the Church of England and unfeigned piety ; to which is added a discourse on 1 Tim. 4:7 to some of the clergy at a publick meeting.
titleStmt.author: Eachard, John, 1636?-1697.
H. M.
Lover of the Church of England and unfeigned piety.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for Richard Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: Attribution to Eachard very doubtful. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
